EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi! We are excited to announce Jim Crosby as your new dedicated point of contact for all your commercial modular space needs. Jim is highly experienced with decades of modular experience and successful projects. His expertise will ensure you receive exceptional communication, service, and support in fulfillment of your modular space needs.
Here are some of the types of space Jim can assist you with: Offices https://www.boxxmodular.com/offices/ Classrooms https://www.boxxmodular.com/classrooms/ Specialty Buildings https://www.boxxmodular.com/specialty/
Jim is looking forward to connecting with you! For your convenience, here is his contact information: Jim Crosby jcrosby@boxxmodular.com (919) 208-9270
If you need more space now, or are considering modular solutions for the future, reach out to discuss some options. We are here to help!
